com.github.dm.jrt.android.v11.core

Class LoaderContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dm.jrt.android.v11.core.LoaderContext

  • public abstract class LoaderContext
extends Object
    Class representing an Android loader context (like activities or fragments).

    No strong reference to the wrapped objects will be retained by this class implementations. So, it is up to the caller to ensure that they are not garbage collected before being called.

    Created by davide-maestroni on 07/08/2015.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Object getComponent()
      Returns the wrapped component.
      abstract Context getLoaderContext()
      Returns the loader context.
      abstract LoaderManager getLoaderManager()
      Returns the loader manager of the specific component.
      static LoaderContext loaderFrom(Activity activity)
      Returns a context wrapping the specified activity.
      static LoaderContext loaderFrom(Activity activity, Context context)
      Returns a context wrapping the specified activity, with the specified instance as the loader context.
      static LoaderContext loaderFrom(Fragment fragment)
      Returns a context wrapping the specified fragment.
      static LoaderContext loaderFrom(Fragment fragment, Context context)
      Returns a context wrapping the specified fragment, with the specified instance as the loader context.

      • loaderFrom

        @NotNull
public static LoaderContext loaderFrom(@NotNull
                               Activity activity)
        Returns a context wrapping the specified activity.
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity instance.
        Returns:
        the loader context.

      • loaderFrom

        @NotNull
public static LoaderContext loaderFrom(@NotNull
                               Activity activity,
                               @NotNull
                               Context context)
        Returns a context wrapping the specified activity, with the specified instance as the loader context.
        In order to prevent undesired leaks, the class of the specified context must be static.
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity instance.
        context - the context used to get the application one.
        Returns:
        the loader context.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the class of the specified context has not a static scope.

      • loaderFrom

        @NotNull
public static LoaderContext loaderFrom(@NotNull
                               Fragment fragment)
        Returns a context wrapping the specified fragment.
        Parameters:
        fragment - the fragment instance.
        Returns:
        the loader context.

      • loaderFrom

        @NotNull
public static LoaderContext loaderFrom(@NotNull
                               Fragment fragment,
                               @NotNull
                               Context context)
        Returns a context wrapping the specified fragment, with the specified instance as the loader context.
        In order to prevent undesired leaks, the class of the specified context must be static.
        Parameters:
        fragment - the fragment instance.
        context - the context used to get the application one.
        Returns:
        the loader context.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the class of the specified context has not a static scope.
